Korbi Kelly-Banks was out visiting with Bethany First Selectman Paula Cofrancesco today. So here’s a #CityHallSelfie, this time with actual people in it. 😉 https://t.co/aTP35mBsSa pic.twitter.com/weh24jNdbK

With all of the Millions in commitments from individuals & Corporations to Black America, why are we still mercifully allowing the system to omit the truth whenever we are capable of using those funds to build schools on our own which will teach the truth https://t.co/AsmBpYCSOW
